thread.title: BRIEF-Sharjah Islamic Bank FY Profit Rises

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sharjah Islamic Bank FY Profit Rises

organizations.name: brief-sharjah islamic bank fy profit rises

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - SHARJAH ISLAMIC BANK:
* FY NET PROFIT 477.7 MILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 462.9‍​ MILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* FY TOTAL INCOME 1.49‍​ BILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 1.37 BILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* AS OF END-DEC 2017, TOTAL CUSTOMER DEPOSITS STAND AT 22.3 BILLION DIRHAMS VERSUS 18.4 BILLION DIRHAMS YEAR AGO
* ANNOUNCES FY CASH DIVIDEND OF 8 PERCENT OF PAID UP CAPITAL Source: ( bit.ly/2Dx6DTJ ) Further company coverage:
